item.title: That One Dev
item.description: Who Is Joey Hops? Hi there! I’m Joe Hopkins, or Joey Hops if you prefer. I’m a software engineer here in beautiful Calgary, Alberta. Currently I’m working for a company called Wiles Jackson Inc. as a Full Stack Software Engineer. Recently we’ve been tapped by Trans Mountain (the pipeline guys) to manage and develop custom Sharepoint solutions for them, our biggest project being the PALMS Permit and Compliance Management system, a Modern Sharepoint Webpart developed using ReactJS and Typescript.
